items.sentence: Tom sat on the sofa, reading the evening paper.
The first thing we have to do is fire the cook.
This is one of the jobs I have to do every day.
This is the biggest fish that I've ever caught.
This is the village where I spent my childhood.
Will you be safe until the next time I see you?
That's a very old-fashioned way of saying that.
You were unconscious for more than three hours.
Tom will be late because of a traffic accident.
Short of a miracle, it'll just go on like this.
